attributes.action: Refund Capital Guaranteed ISA's bought with NDF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Capital Secure Fixed Growth Plan ISA bought through NDF, a British Company , underwritten by Lehman Brothers Bank in America,which has gone bankrupt.Now that the British Government has guaranteed everyone's savings in Icelandic Banks that have defaulted we expect the same guarantees.
